title: The Boy who could fly
brief_description: This is a story of love and courage, filled with moments of great humour. A sensitive girl moves to a new neighbourhood and befriends the autistic and mysterious boy next door. He spends his day perched at his window, dreaming of flight. A sympathetic teacher (Colleen Dewhurst) hopes
